entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Wet snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wet snow beginning late in the evening then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
